  • Emergency Management The Emergency Management Team is responsible for the coordination of the City's emergency planning, training, response, and recovery efforts of major disasters.
  • Emergency Preparedness
  • Environmental Health We serve the public by assuring compliance with local ordinances; respond to calls for service; enforce local ordinances or state law regarding health issues; and to prevent and detect ordinance violations.

  • More Information
  • Municipal Court The Municipal Court's primary function is to process all Class C Criminal charges filed by the Police Department and Code Enforcement Officers alleged to have occurred within the city limits of the City of South Padre Island. These include charges filed under the Texas Transportation Code, Penal Code, Alcoholic Beverage Code, Health and Safety Code, Education Code, and the City of South Padre Island Code of Ordinances.

  • Public Transit Island Metro is a FREE fixed route system that operates within the City of South Padre Island and Port Isabel.

SPI Projects

South Padre Island Convention Center Expansion

Expanding the Convention Center is a priority as the Island is dependent upon tourism. Efforts to expand the existing Convention Center have been in the works for over 15 years.

Click here to view the South Padre Island Convention Center Expansion Project

presentation that will be shown at the City Council Workshop on July 2 nd
